text: today guys I'm making something really

added a quarter cup of light brown sugar
to a Dutch oven everything's just gonna
get combined in here and you throw it in
the oven a teaspoon of cayenne a
tablespoon of coarse salt I'm using
kosher salt so don't use a tablespoon if
you're not going to use kosher salt use
a teaspoon and a half of regular salt
and a teaspoon of black pepper so you
can see that we're building a lot of

around just a tiny bit
I want it nicely combined and then to
that you're gonna add three pounds of

just helps it cook more evenly and more

oven method is a great substitute the
liquid that this is gonna cook in one
and a half cups of cider vinegar so
you're gonna get a lot of tangy

the pork shoulder is so great for this
